1.content: What company's characters do you want to star?
1.title: Round 1 choices

choices: Final Fantasy VII (hey, it's the most popular)
111.title: Final Fantasy

choices: With help from materia and/or the lifestream itself
11121.content:
Sephiroth had been defeated, the world was safe from meteor. Two years later, Khdaj and by association Sephiroth were stopped, the world was safe yet again. This was great and all, but one problem remained, Tifa Lockheart couldn't help but feel that she didn't help enough. Especially the second crisis, Cloud practically handled it himself. Looking in the mirror, Tifa knew that men liked what she saw. Hell, she liked what she saw, a slim toned body and a huge pair of breasts. One thing though, Tifa couldn't shake the feeling that if she had some more muscle on her body she could do much more damage. Her intense martial arts training allowed her to get much more strength out of her body than the vast majority of people, but if she added more muscle, then she could be so much stronger.


How would Tifa go about gaining this muscle?
11121.title: Tifa

choices: Aya fails and gives in to the temptation
Aya is shocked out of her dream and back into reality in the shower
114.content:
Aya breathes a sigh of relief as she lays down Maya's corpse, realizing that her sister had become a victim to her own body's desire to consume, grow and evolve. She wondered how it came to all this, how a simple accident led to the destruction of her beloved city, the death of her mentor and countless others.

Weary from both climactic battles for survival against the beings of mitochondria, she stumbled back to the meager collection of police officers left standing, greeted them and started walking home for much needed rest. Out of nowhere, she remembered Maya... no, Eve's warning that Aya was simply the more evolved of the two and she would eventually seek to dominate the world and make it her brood. The very idea sent a chill down her spine. If a simple, and small, transplant caused Melissa Pierce to grow into a nigh unstoppable monster hell bent on birthing a new species, what hope would she have with the Eve gene and mitochondria native to her?

Almost home she walked by some kids wandering in the direction of the police, when a forty foot piece of a compromised building fell on the street below, right onto the kids. Aya froze in shock thinking she had just seen yet two more lives snuffed out thanks to this carnage. Thankfully she heard crying and ran over to discover the piece was supported by an steel ibeam barely holding the mass of the object from slamming the children into the pavement.

Aya didn't have much time, it'd take too long to go and get help, it'd give way by the time they got back to lift it up enough to get the children to safety. She gripped the slab, hoping beyond hope that somehow she'd be able to shift it. As the fatigue started to set in, her limbs shaking violently, brow furrowed in effort, she could think of only one thing:

"More"

She needed more power. With that thought, and her desperation at the situation, Aya never noted the shivering in her arms decreasing, her breaths deeper and her strength increasing. The massive piece started to rise, its girth and mass no match from the growing titaness letting her will be known. Still, she lifted, determined to save the children. The children, whom had stopped crying and started staring in shock as the person's legs and feet who was lifting the object were visibly growth thicker and larger, even through the pants and shoes.

With one mighty heave, and an equally impressive flash of violent growth that threatened to create tears in her clothes, the flab was flipped off the children. Ecstatic, but exhausted, she fell to her knees and the newly grown musculature compressed itself back into her original muscle's dimensions. The kids were grateful they had been saved, and gave her tons of kisses, something she appreciated in this time of crisis. She had tapped into her maternal power and protected her young... This thought froze Aya in place.

She didn't have kids, she didn't believe she had any maternal instinct and the shudder of pleasure that roared through her when 'power' was mentioned, worried her. She quickly pointed the kids back in the direction of the officers, and started on the way home again. Stumbling through the door, she moved her sweat drenched body to the shower... and found the water was still on. She quickly stripped down, stepped into the warm stream and relaxed...

While in the shower she drifted off into daydream, or at least one reminiscent of a date she recently. She was home with a fellow NYPD detective, donning her little black dress and inviting him into the bedroom. Grinning at the memory, since it was a very memorable night. Something was wrong though. As she removed her clothes, and he his. As they nuzzled and licked at each other's necks, ears, chests and lips she felt an arousal well up in her that definitely wan't there when that memory took place.

She started sweating profusely, and quickly hastened things to where they could fuck, her mind nearly snarling the word and her dream counterpart almost as savage. The penetration was incredible, it was as if the floodgates had opened in her soul. As he first entered her he noticed back spasm and bulge out in all directions, but this was beauty to him, this was POWER. He rammed into her further, to reveal more of her true self, to set her free.

Aya's dream mind was in complete meltdown, she felt something give inside her, something primal and overwhelmingly pleasurable. What she thought was an orgasm causing her back to tremble, wasn't. She was losing control...
114.title: Parasite Eve - Temptation

choices: Wake up, embrace her other side?
Take this as an even greater warning to succumbing to the tempation
1141.content:
And with that realization, it was lost. A triumphant roar sprang from her increasingly supple lips as her neck thickened, her back erupted with an avalache of audibly growing and pulsating muscle down her widening back. So much so that she was left with chasms of shadow between each defined slab of she-meat. Her jaw thickened and her face pushed out into a slight muzzle as her arms joined the party, quickly leap from as thick as a telephone pole to as thick as two, with her hands spreading out to match, thick fingers with brutal claws adorning their ends.

Her legs saw the most dramatic shift, her knees reversing and tree trunk muscles causing her hips, legs, ass and vagina to grow to match. The latter of which was so active with the rutting from her mate and its own excitement would could mistake it for a mouth chewing on something. Sadly her muscle building body consumed her breasts, leaving her with carapace-like pectorals several inches thick and abs imitating steel plate armor.

Letting her long spotted tongue hang out of her mouth reveling in the sights, sounds and smells of her arrival as queen she roared once again, a sound of human pleasure and agony and of animal lust. In a moment of duality, both the Queen and Aya gazed at each other in the mirror across from her. Shock and Pride, Desperation and Exilaration at their form. And in one moment, glancing back her beloved colleague, observing her mate she felt a swelling within her. A limitless bounty blossomed from within her, he was neither mate to discard after use or a sexless acquaintance. To both, to the Queen's surprise at her own capacity for pointless sentimentatlity and emotion, he was their love.

The physical reaction and agreement of both caused an enormous boost in growth. She felt her ovaries multiplying within her, growing larger. Her uterus forming dozens more within her colossal frame, now almost 21 feet tall and 8 feet wide. Her breasts returned with a passion, with new nipples, larger mammaries and muscle within for the conscious dispensation.


Even after the roaring he didn't stop, and Aya finally realized why: He was her ideal for a lover as well as her desire to let her true beauty be known. With that she grunted and squelched as a wide muscular tail the same color as her skin and with a stinger at the end burst from above her lower back and plunged its stinger into her lover. The reaction was almost instant, he became a male beast counterpart to her, positioned himself just outside her hungry nether maw and plunged in.

Their union caused both, but especially Queen Aya to experience explosive growth while they roared like the beasts they'd become.

What does Aya do now?
1141.title: Aya fails and gives in to the temptation

122.title: Street Fighter

choices: She takes part in a strange experiment.
She encounters a new fighter with a strange form of magic.
Something happens during the latest MvC crossover tournament
1221.content: How does the world's strongest woman grow even stronger?
1221.title: Chun Li

choices: She lifts Mjolner becoming the mighty thor!
12213.title: Something happens during the latest MvC crossov...

1223.content: Next up, Sakura Kasugano or the new girl from Street Fighter IV, Crimson Viper.
1223.title: More Street Fighters

choices: Sakura overhears about a local street fighting competition
Sakura's rival, Karin, shows up unexpectedly
12231.content:
"Hadouken!" yelled out Sakura after having countered one of her sensei's moves, thus setting up the perfect opportunity to use one of the trademark moves of her mentor, Ryu.

Even though Dan had come to expect the counter move the pink-gi wearing marshal arts was still startled and blown slightly away from the chi force behind Sakura's attack. Dan grunted briefly as he lowered his well-placed arms.

Even after all this time Sakura's potential would still surprise Dan from time to time. There was a reason Sakura reminded not just him but many of Ryu's own infinite fighting potential.

'The kid's come a long way since I first took her under my gifted wing.' Dan commented to himself silently before telling Sakura to take a break. The girl nodded while she wiped the sweat off her forehead with a towel tossed over to her by Dan.

"Keep it at kiddo and maybe one day you'll be able to fight your friend on equal footing." stated Dan as Sakura walked pass him. The girl paused for a moment before turning back and eying her teacher with a proud smile.

"Maybe? No way Sensei...one day I will prove myself of being his equal! You just watch!"

Dan only shook his head in amusement as he watched Sakura bounce away happily.

Later as Sakura was making her way home...
12231.title: Sakura's story begins...

choices: Sakura heads over to sign up before beginning to train for the competition
Before Sakura signs up she spots Karin who is there for the same reason
122311.content:
Walking home peacefully Sakura was content with the way her training was coming along. She knew Ryu fought and train hard so she had to do the same if she was going to match him in any sort of way.

While she had the training aspect down pact the actual fighting was a bit lackluster. Being challenged by the local scrubs wasn't exactly something that was pushing her to the limit.

Of course Sakura met and treated every fight as a welcomed challenge and never pulled or purposely held back but despite not being the best in the world Sakura was still miles ahead of them so they were exactly helping her to improve...

Having stopped to grab a soda can out of a venting machine Sakura shrugged slightly as she popped open the top and downed a bit of the soft drink. Can't be helped I suppose, she thought silently.

Suddenly she picked up on a conversation by two passerby's, both of them guys around her age.

"So did you hear about the competition that's being held this weekend?"

"Yeah what about?"

"What do you mean, what about it? Man don't you understand who is freaking going to be there?!"

The second boy raised an eyebrow now interested.

"Russia's glory! "The Red Cyclone", Zangief! That guy's a total beast he'll tear through or should I say throw any poor bastard that gets put up against him." stated the excitable boy, most likely a huge fan of the Russian pro wrestler. At the mention of the Russian's name however Sakura's interest was equally peaked.

Zangief, she remembered him well. A mountain of a man who lived off competition, the admiration his fellow countrymen had for him, and throwing around his opponents as if they were simple dolls. Truly a fierce some fighter that would have had his complete way with Sakura had Cammy White not interfered when she did...

Interested in the competition mentioned Sakura finished her drink, tossed in away in a nearby trash can, and sprinted up to the two calling out as she did.

"Excuse me, this competition you were talking about. Where is it being held at?"

The fanboy to the Russian wrestler and his friend turned around and were rather surprised to see Sakura meeting them with a curious expression.

"Um...not far from here actually. You know of the dome where all the wrestling matches take place, well that's the place. But why do you..."

"Thanks, it's been a long time since I've last seen "The Red Cyclone"...and I'm itching for a rematch!" Sakura stated excitedly with a mild fist pump. Then with a simple goodbye she took off running in the opposite direction.

"Hey wait! The competition's till tomorrow, today's just the sign-up date you're probably not going to find him much less fight him today!" called out the wrestling fan.

"Did she really imply she's fought "The Red Cyclone" before?" questioned the second youth a look of surprise still present on his face.

"Yeah I think she did...not only that but she's still standing and wants to fight him again! That's either one hell of a girl or she's out of her damn mind..."
122311.title: A new competition and a possible rematch...

choices: Sakura begins her training for the competition
Before she can begin her training Sakura runs into someone
1223111.content:
Heading over to the sport stadium Sakura enters the massive building Sakura then asks a nearby security guard where the competition sign-up was taking place. After being pointed in the right direction the youthful fighter gives her thanks before sprinting away.

With a quick input of her name Sakura is now in tomorrow's tournament While anxious for the battles ahead Sakura notices that there was in fact a good deal of names listed, she figured every fighter in town must have gotten word of the competition and rushed over to put their names down.

She wasn't meditated by this however instead she brunette saw it as a way to test her skills until she reached the main event. Yes she would have her rematch with the mighty Zangief. Once again she found herself giddy at the thought of fighting the Russian and blissfully wished Ryu could be here to watch her do so...

On that note Sakura found herself wondering if her perhaps by some chance Ryu was in fact here and had signed up for the tournament, fighting and showing off her strength to both her mentor and Zangief would be a dream come true for young Sakura!

Suddenly as she exited the sports arena a voice called out to her effectively bringing her back to reality.

"Kasugano Sakura?"

Turning around Sakura stared intently at the dark suited man approaching her, as he did so she clenched her right fist.

"I'm here on orders of my employer Konzuki Karin."

Sakura blinked as she heard her rival's name, "What does she want now?" Sakura asked humorously.

"Unfortunately Miss Karin states that she can not be a part of tomorrow's competition." the man stated.

"Oh yeah...darn that's a shame I guess..." said Sakura with a bit of a shrug.

"But on that note she wants you to win in her place..."

"I don't work for Karin, if I win I do for my own personal goals not hers!" exclaimed Sakura as she cut off the man's word.

"She said you say something of that nature. Regardless she wanted her to have this." Digging into his shirt pocket the man brought out a small box before handing it over to a slightly confused Sakura.

"What's this?" she asked.

"Inside Miss Karin says should help you win the tournament, use in good faith."

With his duty done Karin's hired help made his exit leaving Sakura to ponder at Karin's "gift" to her.

"Help me win huh?" Sakura smirked as she tossed the box up and caught it on it's decent.

"Whatever, Karin." she mumbled before stuffing the box into one of the pockets of her pants.
1223111.title: Sakura's in the tournament...but Karin isn't...

choices: It was Ryu's friend, Ken Masters
It was her Sensei, Dan Hibiki
12231112.content:
As she went on her way Sakura thought back to Karin's gift for a moment she pondered on what could be inside the smallish box given to her and how exactly it would help her win.

But as she did so Sakura failed to noticed that she was moment's away from bumping into an incoming person. A second later and only then did she realize her mental error.

Sakura bowed and apologized as she came face to face with the individual she had crashed with...
12231112.title: Sakura's accidental run in...

choices: Curious Sakura tries out some of the vial's contents
Suddenly Sakura remembers her friend Kei is sleeping over tonight
1223112.content:
As Sakura arrived at the wrestling arena she was already anxious and looking forward to the competition. With the Red Cyclone being at the event Sakura knew she had to fight as best she could if she wanted to face the overly muscled Russian one more time.

"This time I'll win for sure." Sakura mumbled with a grin as she pounded her fists together. But before she could enter the building the entrance doors flew open as Karin Konzuki made her exit.

"Karin-san?!" called out Sakura as she caught somewhat off guard by her rival's sudden appearance.

"Hm? Oh Sakura-san...figures you too would end up coming here." stated Karin rather bluntly.

"And I see you joined as well." retorted Sakura with a bit of a smirk.

"Of course it will be an honor to go up against "The Red Cyclone" himself"

"What makes you think you're going to make it that far!" interrupted Sakura her smirk growing ever larger.

"Oh please Sakura, I will mow through these no-names and find myself face to face with the mighty Zangief."

As Karin spoke Sakura could almost visualize her rival's head inflate with confidence so she decided to bring the blonde girl back down to earth for a moment.

"Aren't you forgetting that I'll be in the tournament as well. I'd hate to crush your dreams of glory Karin but I'm looking for a potential rematch with the cyclone."

"You? You'll be destroyed by him." stated Karin as if it were a matter of fact.

"What? Why you...you don't know how strong I've become!"

"It won't be enough. In fact if you and I end up battling it still won't be enough." Karin stated earning her a sharp glare from Sakura, "But I suppose I can do you at least one kindness..."

Sakura wondered what her rivial was going on about as she fumbled around within a pocket of hers. A few moments later Karin brought out a small vial filled with some oddly colored liquid. Tossing it over Sakura caught the small object rather easily.

"Use that if you want true strength Sakura-san. It's the only way you're going to defeat me or The Russian."

With that said Karin made her exit leaving a dumbfounded Sakura in her wake.

"What is this?" Sakura wondered as she eyed the mysterious vial, slipping it away in her pant's pocket Sakura decided to put more thought into it back home as she remembered she still had to register for tomorrow's competition.

Later that night as Sakura laid on her bed she thought back to the vial that Karin had given to her, the vial now resting on her desk beside her fighting gloves.

"True strength...what's Karin getting at and how does that apply to that stuff she gave me..." she thought out loud eying the vial once more.
1223112.title: Sakura's run in with Karin

choices: Flash forward to Sakura heading off to the tournament
Sakura accidentally sleeps in and is awaken by her friend Kei
12231121.content:
Sighing Sakura figured the contents of the vial wasn't going to leave her mind until she found out just what was within. Getting off her bed Sakura made her over to her desk before grabbing the cause of her curiosity.

"Okay Karin...this better be good." Sakura mumbled to herself before popping off the top.

"It's not a lot so I guess I should take a quick sip and nothing more." eying the vial once more Sakura made sure to make a mental note of haunting her rival just in case she bit the big one.

"Well here goes." taking in a breath Sakura dipped the vial toward her mouth and took in a small sample of the liquid substance.

"Blah!" coughed Sakura, the taste was rather terrible and reminded her of the nasty-tasting cough medicine(s) her doctor would give to her whenever she would fall ill. Sakura cursed at Karin for giving her something completely horrible but suddenly she felt her body tremble for a moment.

Sakura gasped as a strange feeling of tension overcoming her entire body frame!

"Karin...if you poisoned me..." Sakura gasped once more as she heard a faint yet distant stretching sound.

Amazed Sakura began to notice attire stretch and tear away as her body was seemingly growing but instead of height it was more her already tone muscles expanding slightly outward.

Her already muscled legs swelled thicker as they tried to force their way out of her simple jeans, her upper body causing her t-shirt to ride up and expose her new six pack set of abs. As Sakura watched her widening shoulders and biceps begin to push the sleeves of her shirt closer to it's limit she felt the rear and front section begin to tear away as her back grew thicker and wider same for her breasts as they rose a cup larger and her growing pectoral muscles assisted them in tearing away at her simple shirt.

The growth soon subsided and Sakura found herself gasping for a moment astonishment washing over her as she looked over her new size. Tip-toeing out of her room and into the bathroom Sakura eyed her reflection.

She was had shot up two inches possibly three but more importantly she could visually see the strain her new muscles were putting on her attire. While neither her shirt nor her pants had fully torn Sakura knew if she had continued growing they wouldn't have lasted much longer, which reminded her to remove her bra before it would snap in two or apply a painful amount of pressure on her chest.

Doing a short flex of her arms Sakura watched in amazement as her biceps swelled for several inches and a brief tearing sound could be heard not wanting to completely ruin her shirt Sakura released her flex and instead gave her legs a try and giggled softly as she watched them swell to rival those of her friend and Interpol agent Chun-Li.

'I finally have legs as big as Miss Chun-Li!' Sakura thought to herself before releasing the flex once again not wanting to ruin her attire...well anymore then she already had.

Sakura smiled as she did a quick turn and eyed her larger back and wider shoulders, even her neck seem to have grown a tad bit thicker.

She had to admit Sakura really enjoyed her new look, arms as big as Ryu's, bigger breasts, a solid set of abs, and legs as thick as Chun-Li's yes Sakura was indeed very pleased with the outcome of Karin's strange formula.

It was then she realized that must have been what Karin had meant earlier and why she gave it to her in the first place. Sneaking back into her room Sakura decides to wear some more loose clothing she had tossed around in her closet and could only ponder away at how she was going to explain the growth spurt to her parents and younger brother.

Tomorrow was going to be a rather interesting day.
12231121.title: Sakura takes a quick sip of Karin's vial

choices: The girls successfully sneak out of the house
Sakura's little brother Tsukushi spots them on the way out
122311212.content:
The next day as usual Sakura overslept, her dreams consisting of going one-on-one against Zangief except in this fantasy she was his equal in size and strength then later lifting up Ryu with a single arm...

Sakura purred softly in her sleep enjoying her wonderful visions that is until a knock came at her door.

"Sakura! Wake up, it's me!" called out her long time friend Kei. The long-haired girl knew Sakura had a bad habit of sleeping-in but after phoning her last night about the competition today Kei figured she'd best make sure her street fighting friend didn't sleep away the morning.

Kei called out once more as she gave the door a mild knock. Inside Sakura had barely awaken annoyed that her fun dreams had come to an end yet suddenly remembered that today was the day of the competition, on top of that Sakura recalled what Karin's formula had done to her body late last night.

"Sakura!" yelled Kei and made Sakura realize how was she going to explain her sudden growth. Shrugging she decided it'd be best not to keep Kei waiting and merely show her friend the new her.

"Come on in, the door's unlocked." said Sakura in response, a moment later Kei entered the room to find a very different Sakura staring back at her.

"Hey!" said Sakura with a simple wave and smile.

"What...what happen to you? You're huge, Sakura!"

"Woah Kei keep it down will ya, my family still doesn't know about this." stated Sakura as she made her way over to her door and closed it shut.

"How?" asked Kei still rather stun that her friend had grown into a miniature amazon over night.

"Because of that" Sakura pointed over toward the vial at top of her desk, "Karin-san gave it to me and it's the reason I'm like this." she explained while mildly flexing her right arm.

"Konzuki-san? But why? I mean you told me yesterday both of you were going to be in the competition today so why..."

Sakura shrugged slightly, "My guess is that she's going to use some of this stuff as well and while I would have still fought her without using any of it...um my curiosity got the better of me and I drank just a tad."

Sakura giggled as Kei slapped her forehead with a single hand.

"Figures you'd go and do something like that. Anyway what are you going to tell your family?"

"Growth spurt?" responded Sakura as if it was the simplest answer in the world.

"I'm not sure they'll completely buy that..." Kei stated with a deep sigh, at times Sakura truly tired out the poor girl.

"Okay...well here carry this for me, Kei-chan." handing over the vial Sakura smiled at Kei.

"You're not thinking of taking anymore of this crazy stuff, are you...oh wait it's you of course you are..."

"What no not right now anyway. This new strength I have is just fine and I can just train with these new muscles of mine. Karin's formula is only a back-up if I ever need it that and I don't want mom or dad finding it here and thinking it's something much worse then it actually is. So do this for me, Kei, please."

Sakura pleaded her case with a somewhat puppy-dog expression which contrasted somewhat with her bigger form making her appear a bit comical. Thinking it over Kei sighed once more in the end Sakura was a good friend and Kei knew Sakura could always depend on her if she needed to.

"Oh alright but first we have to deal with your parents."

This time it was Sakura's turn to sigh, "I overslept again right...well hopefully we can sneak out without them noticing."

'You're going to have to tell them eventually...' thought Kei with a mental groan.
122311212.title: Kei meets the new Sakura

choices: Karin looks a bit bigger then Sakura remembers...
Woah! Karin's a lot bigger from the last time Sakura saw her!
122312.content:
As Sakura made her way home following her training with Dan she began to think over his words to her from before.

"Just like I said one day I'll run into Ryu-san again and when I do I'll show him how strong I've got."

Pounding her gloved fists together Sakura smiled a content grin.

"I can't wait to see how strong he's become as well. Ryu-san never stops training or fighting so beating him in a match won't be easy but like always I'll give it my all!"

"I see that he is still the focal point in your life, Sakura-san."

Sakura paused in her tracks as she instantly knew of the voice that had called out to her.

"Karin-san..." mumbled Sakura with something of a grin on her lips. Being the rival to the heiress of the Konzuki name Sakura was rarely surprised anymore whenever Karin seem to pop up and challenge her for a battle.

By comparison Sakura could only imagine this is how it was for Ryu who must be pestered by constant challengers on a day to day basis, it was something that made Sakura happy to know that she had at least one more thing in common with her mentor.

"What do you want?" replied Sakura casually with a tint of humor.

"How rude." huffed Karin from a distance, "You know exactly what I want. You and I will now engage in battle. Are you up for it, Sakura?"

"I've gotten stronger since last time, Karin, but if you're up for it then I'm game." answered Sakura with a quick pop of her knuckles.

"Good to hear...because so have I." replied Karin.

Sakura could sense the confidence in Karin's vocal tone. It seemed this time Karin was ready to go full-force on her and being the fighter she was Sakura welcomed the challenge.

Shifting her weight and turning over Sakura came to eye Karin face to face.
122312.title: Sakura's rival, Karin, shows up unexpectedly

choices: It's time to get started on Mika's workout routine!
12233.content: How about the lovely Rainbow Mika, whose recent revival in Street Fighter V has certainly bolstered her presence?
12233.title: Even more femme fatales

She takes part in a strange experiment.
122331.content: How will the buxom wrestler get stronger?
122331.title: Mika's Time to Shine!

choices: Continue on with another DMC gal...
124.content: Dante has met and come across several women in his adventures so first let us start off with the two most known and beloved, Lady and Trish.
124.title: Devil May Cry

choices: She feels with extra energy, she decides to work out to spend it
A powerful pain overcomes her, she grows bodybuilder size, ripped and vascular.
She calls Trish to help her investigate more about the crystal.
1242.content:
The demon huntress Lady, entered through the her apparment's door, she sighed, tired of a long day of work. Sha had been hired by Doctor Samantha Jones, a museum researcher, who specialized in ancient arcane artifacts to kill a demoness sorceress, and recover a red crystal she had stolen, the demoness was trying to do a strange arcane ritual.

She remebered exactly how the mission went, she tracked the demoness to an underground altar, there she was using some kind of magic on the crystal, silently she approached and aimed on of her guns at her, the sorceress fell to the ground with a bullet in her head, then she had proceded to take the crystal.

Lady frowned, remembering the strange feeling she had felt the moment the glowing red crystal touched her hand, for a moment she thought that the ritual had been complete, and the artifact had unleashed some sort of power, but after that, she didn't feel anything.

The demon huntress took the crystal back to the museum, where Doctor Samantha, happily, paid her, she was really grateful for having the crystal back, Lady could tell, that the good doctor wanted the crystal for more than studying, but she didn't really care.

Lady took of her great rocket luncher and left it near her bed, she took of all of her guns, changed her clothes, and prepeared for a good night sleep.

But she couldn't stop thinking, in the crystal, and the strange feeling felt when she had touched it...
1242.title: Lady

1253.title: Other Capcom Series

12531.title: Darkstalkers

12532.title: Marvel vs. Capcom

choices: when shes in the danger room.
1253211.content: when does the x woman change?
1253211.title: Psylocke

choices: She finds a hammer in the middle of the nowhere.
She finds a super solider serum in Shadowloos custody.
1253221.content: how does the first lady of fighting games get buff?
1253221.title: Chun Li

choices: Her hair starts to grow long and blond.
12532211.content:
Interpol agent Chun li was having a rather long, boring day,

She had been investigating a series of reports that shadow-loo members were in hiding in the state of New Mexico, there were also reports of a freak thunderstorm a couple of day back,

Chun li had driven for the past couple of hours for miles to meet up with a few close Allies of hers to help solve this case.

Wishing to take a break from all this stress, chun li parked at the side of the road to catch a breath,

while lunging on the side of the car, Chun li took a glance and notice a object not to far away from where she was standing,

so she went to see what it was and to her surprise, it was a large, square-headed gray lump hammer.

she went to pick up the hammer to analyze it, she read on The side of the hammer that carried the inscription "Whosoever holds this hammer, if he be worthy, shall possess the power of Thor."

how does she transform?
12532211.title: She finds a hammer in the middle of the nowhere.

132.content:
This Legend of Zelda takes place right after most of the events of "Twilight Princess". If you haven't played the game...many spoilers may be ahead...

It has been nearly 3 months since Link has last seen Ilia, Ordon village or any of his friends of the village. He has come a long way though and has restored peace to Hyrule once again. On his travels he has met many interesting young ladies including Midna, his companion throughout his journey, Ilia, his childhood friend and maybe more, and most notable of all, princess Zelda, who helped him defeat Ganondorf in his final stand against the legendary hero.

The spirits of light have restored Midna to her former self, an imposing woman of nearly 7 feet and stunning beauty. Before they say farewell to Midna as she travels back to the Twilight realm, princess Zelda and Link ask her to stay for at least the burial ceremony of their fallen comrades as well as the burning of Ganondorf’s body. She agrees.

As the heroes and most of Hyrule pay their debts to the heroic knights that gave their lives defending the land, the Triforce of Power in Ganondorf’s body is experiencing a major calamity due to the death of it host. Tricked into thinking there are no other signs of life anywhere, the Triforce transforms into a Triforce of its own, able to grant any wish to the bearer while still retaining its Triforce of Power abilities. It immediately flies off out of its host’s carcass and finds its new host…
132.title: Legend of Zelda

1322.content:
Midna didn’t feel a thing when the Triforce chose her as the new bearer.

“Midna,” Zelda called out as she approached Midna “we are about to start the ceremony and would be honored…if-“ Zelda paused as she heard that familiar call the Triforce makes when it is near one of its other parts. Midna heard it too but she didn’t recognize it. Suddenly she noticed the mark of the Triforce on her hand, glowing! She quickly hid her hands behind her back.

“I-If what?” Midna asked hesitantly

“…if you would join us in the memorial ceremony as our other guest of honor with Link.” Zelda said with clear suspicion.

“Oh, yeah! Of course! Yeah, I’ll be there, don’t worry about it!” Zelda gave a ‘thank you ‘ nod and bow and left with a soft smile.

Recollecting her limited Hyrulean knowledge of legends past and the Triforce, she remembered that it could grant any wish to the bearer of all three parts. Just then, as she was staring aimlessly at the mark on her hand, she noticed that all three portions were lit. Did that mean she possessed all three parts of the Triforce? But how could that be? Zelda noticed she had the Triforce. So Midna decided to stop wasting time and make a wish to test this new found treasure.

“Now what do I really want most of all...?” she thought to herself.

She really wanted to be strong, and independent, and didn’t want to rely on a hero next time she was in danger. She wanted to be able to lead her people properly and not be some sort of cowardly, spoiled-rotten, royal princess. She wanted to be a leader and the center of attention at all times.

“I got it!” she exclaimed to herself. “I wish I was a strong and independent princess of Twilight with unquestionable power.” Instantly the Triforce on her hand began to glow and a golden light surrounded her. She felt a surge of power flow through her body and a pleasant warmth rise up from her core. When the glowing had stopped she felt really strong, but, in a physical sense! She got up and looked at her reflection in a nearby fountain, what she saw she couldn’t believe, or stop loving!

Her once petite legs now rounded with definition. Her claves stuck out at an impressive 15” and grew to an awesome 22” quad. Moving her fingers up, she could feel bumps on her stomach and instantly fell in love with her new pronounced abdominal muscles. Her breasts have increased in size dramatically to a size C at least with pectoral muscles that put those of most men to shame. Her shoulders broadened as her frame began to adjust to her new physique.

“Oh, my,” she said as she stared in awe, in amazement and in a little bit of lust. She flexed her magnificent 14” bicep peaks “well, this isn’t what I planned would happen.”

Suddenly she heard someone’s footsteps coming closer and closer! How would she explain her new found strength and muscularity? Could she reverse it? And if so, could she also increase her muscular development?
1322.title: Midna

choices: Wish for muscles of her own
13221.content:
Zelda entered the courtyard but as soon as she saw Midna, she stopped dead in her tracks. Staring, gapping, she marveled as she saw 7’ of pure feminine muscle stand before her.

“Midna, how –“

“Wait, Zelda. Don’t ask, just listen.” As Midna told Zelda everything that had happened Zelda couldn’t help but want what she had just received so easily, a sexy body that was sexy to begin with.

“…and then I looked in the fountain and I was, muscular!” both of them were silent for a moment before Zelda spoke again.

“Uh, well, this has never happened before. No one has ever managed to ask the Triforce of a wish before, so we can’t really determine the Triforce’s reaction to such a wish. Perhaps it thought literally about physical strength and granted you that. You see, the Triforce is an animated ‘living’, so to speak, object but has no free will or thought.” Zelda explained.

Midna cast a glance at the back of her right hand where the Triforce was, and all three Triforces were still there! Does this mean she could wish for as many things as she pleased! Zelda noticed this as well and prompted Midna to….
13221.title: It's Zelda

"Midna," Zelda suggested "why don't you try and reverse this wish so we can begin with the remembrance ceremony."

"You're probably right Zelda, but I just love being so strong and muscular...I gotta have more!" she clenched her hands together and paused as she thought on what wish to make "I could always wish myself back to being muscular, and then some!"

"OK," Midna said, comming to a conclusion. "I wish I was..."

1322122.content:
Instantly the golden glow surrounded Midna as she was filled with warmth like nothing else she knew. She felt her already tight abdominal muscles grow tighter and more pronounced and actually visible when un-flexed. Her legs expanded underneath her, as they grew denser with more and more muscle. She could feel the tension in her gown tighten as her shoulders expanded still to accommodate her growing physique. Her biceps bulged larger and larger with every passing moment as Midna began to be the slightest bit aroused by this growth in power again.

When the glowing stopped, she stood an impressive 7 feet, 3 and half inches tall. Her calves dwarfed those of Zelda at an impressive 17”. Her tree-trunk thighs were packed with 26” of dense, hot, hard, feminine muscle. Her impressive 6-pack abs now very pronounced felt like a hard rock with a smooth, thin layer of velvety soft womanly skin flowing with pumping veins, although not so noticeable. Her pectorials pushed her breasts out an extra 2” and enlarged her breasts a whole letter. Her shoulders now felt like tiny stones over two massive 17” arms!

Midna moaned with pleasure as she moved her hands gently over her hard-as-rock body.

“Midna! What are you doing!” Zelda finally exclaimed after snapping back to reality. “The ceremony is starting! I have to open it, so I’m going now, but please wish yourself back to normal.” Zelda nagged as she walked off in a bit of a hurry but also hesitatingly.

Almost as if Midna had been possessed by the very spirit of power herself, Din, Midna ignored her highness’ wishes and proceeded as is.

“…and we are gathered here today,” Zelda introduced “to remember the lives of those that were lost in the war to defend Hyrule.” Suddenly Zelda noticed mumbling coming from the crowd. The whispers quickly evolved into speaking loudly as order in the crowd was eliminated. Many of them began to point and stare on in disgust while a few others began to look on in obvious lust but attempted to hide it.

Zelda quickly turned around her to see what all the commotion was about. And standing behind her was none other than Midna in her full glory and splendid muscle.

“What are you doing?” Zelda scolded Midna “I thought I told you to go back to normal!”

“What if this is how I perceived myself to be as ‘normal’?” Midna argued. Zelda was about to counter her claim when she noticed Link staring at Midna in what appeared to be want and horror at the same time.

“Link!” Midna said as she turned to see who Zelda was aimlessly staring at. “Well? How do you like me now?” Link remained speechless. Secretly Link had a special affinity to muscular women but never really wanted to reveal it.

“Hmm, you poor thing” Midna cooed “How about I show you what I REALLY look like?” Midna clasped her hands together and began to glow a bright golden color and Link gulped expecting what was to come.

“Midna! No!” cried Zelda as she dashed towards Midna to try and stop her.
13221221.title: Midna decides to go as is

choices: They fight, Link and Zelda wins
132212211.content:
But it was too late. Just as Zelda was about to reach Midna, the enchanting light surrounded Zelda as well. She felt a powerful surge of erotic power coursing through her mixed in with a little bit of pain from so much power entering her system all at once. When the glowing stopped, the muscle growth effect began to take effect.

Midna was the first to be affected as her calves seemed to separate even more as the crack in the middle of her calves turned to groves. They grew until they reached a massive 21 and half inches of pure feminine muscle. Her quadriceps were next to grow as the cords of tight tree trunk-sized muscle began to expand even further surpassing the 30” mark and stopping at just barely 31” thick of female meat. Her abs became even harder and denser, thicker and appeared to form canyons from the definition on her lower torso. Her pectorals and breasts also began to flesh-out as mounds of muscle seemed to generate out of no-where onto her already muscular frame escalating a whole new breast size level. Her shoulders spread out to make room for her growing back as they began to just out away from her adding more to her intimidating yet hypnotizing appearance. And finally her biceps and triceps grew to such an extent she could no longer reach her head. She gave a congratulatory flex to herself and watched as her biceps rose to an arousing peak at 22” of pure, hot, hard, erotic, feminine muscle.

Zelda had a similar experience although not as intense. She was not expecting this and she began to see change to her body her mentality about feminine muscle changed dramatically. Her calves began as a mere 11” but soared to a substantial 15” of leg-raising power. Her thighs, originally 20” grew to a noticeable 25” of hard and flexing muscle. Her flat stomach grew mountains of abs as a substantial 6-pack became noticeable. By now her dress was growing tight as muscle was making progress in a desperate cry for air. Her unimpressive A-cup breasts inflated to a D-cup at least with enough pectoral muscle to put any man in the audience to shame. When her back began to add muscle is when her dress gave in and ripped at the seams as pounds of female muscle began to squeeze through. Her gloves grew tighter and tighter until they were shredded by the enormous cords that ran through her forearms became visible. And finally her biceps shot out with no mercy to any garment that stood in the way as it grew from an ignorable 9” to an erotic 13” as boulder-like muscle curled up into a tight ball under her soft, womanly skin.

Everyone in the crowed, before running, now stopped dead in their tracks as their lovely princess turned into a gorgeous mountain of womanly muscle while still retaining her beautiful face. Many also noticed the even larger 7’5” of twilight beauty at its finest as Midna stood there flexing for Link to see. Even with all this new found strength, Zelda still felt a little weak-kneed and nearly collapsed out of the sheer pleasure that experience brought with it.

“Hey! Now look what you did!” Midna cried out in protest! “well I hope your happy, ‘cuz the next one’s gonna cost you.”

“I was trying to help you!”

“Help? Me? As I am now I could crush you or anyone else in this pathetic excuse of a kingdom!”

“You take that back! This is a proud nation and people and we will be treated with respect!”

“Common, Zelda, admit it: you were always jealous of me and how while I was with Link, you were trapped in you castle doing NOTHING!”
Zelda grimaced and clenched her fist as she used every last bit of her will power to stop herself from jumping Midna…again.

“You know what? I don’t even know why I’m still in this stupid land of light anyways. You people are weak. While you were being spoiled and loved by the goddesses, we Twilight have been trapped in your shadows, literally, growing stronger and stronger.”

Zelda couldn’t help but admit to that truth and lower her head in shame. Midna paused for a moment then turned her back to Zelda.

“Maybe Zant was right. Maybe shadow WAS destined to take over light.” A sudden wave of surprise swept through the crowd as many were filled with uncontrollable fear and ran for their safety. Link, sensing this was not the Midna he knew drew out his mighty sword of evil’s bane and clutched it in his left hand and pulled out his trusty Hylian shield, ready for anything Midna might do. Zelda in turn pulled out, as if from nowhere, her Light bow and arrows and aimed it directly at Midna.

“You don’t mean that Midna. I know you. You’re better than this. Whatever happened to you we can fix it.” Zelda said in a concerned voice. Midna just smiled a mischievous smile.

“Heh, do you really think that would work? Not only am I far superior to the both of you physically, but magically as well!” Midna then, with a giant burst of energy, flexed her mighty legs and jumped up in the air an incredible height, overshadowing both Link and Zelda. She preformed two forward flips in the air as she landed behind Link and put him in an arm lock choking position.

“Now I know you are well known to have extra reserves of magic in times of danger, but what about Link? Can he defend himself if I decide to kill him right here and now?” Midna said as her voice seemed to deepen and her eyes suddenly become darker.

“Midna, something’s happening to you. I think the Triforce of power is corrupting you!” Zelda pleaded to no avail.

Midna tightened her squeeze on Link until she cut off his air flow. Not being able to breathe, Link instinctively grabbed Midna’s thick forearms with his seemingly tiny hands in comparison. A blinding light shot out from the back of Link’s hand and surrounded the two of them. The light burned through Midna and she was forced to release Link and instantly the light died down.

“AARRGGGG…!!!!” Midna screeched in a loud voice. “That hurt…” she nearly whispered as she looked menacingly to Link. Both Link and Zelda had a pretty good idea of what was going to happen next and each braced themselves accordingly. “THAT HURT!!!” she now screamed as she leaped towards them at blindingly fast speeds.

1322122111.content:
In the blink of an eye, Midna had defied all human abilities by instantly springing 6 ft towards Link. And with just a faster speed, Midna flexed every one of the muscles in her arm and unleashed a deadly punch that could kill if not severely injure a man. Luckily for link his shield happened to be in the way of her blow and he was flung back a great distance. A large fist shaped dent appeared on his shield where her punch made contact. Link tried to get up and counter but as soon as he put his shield hand down to push himself up he heard a loud crack and collapsed to the floor. The pain was unbearable. With a single blow, Midna was able to not only punch and dent a sacred shield that was passed down through the generations of Hylian knights, but also fractured his arm severely enough through the shield that his arm broke when he put the slightest bit of pressure on it.

Link pushed himself up with his other hand and slowly removed the shield off his crippled limb. Meanwhile Zelda decided to take an offensive of her own. With blazing fast speeds the two titans fought vigorously. Link could barley even see their fist as they exchanged punch for kick. Both seemed evenly matched with each blocking the other’s attack. Finally Midna managed to land a kick right in Zelda’s rock hard abs. Zelda cried out in pain as the wind was literally kicked right out of her. “My, my. I guess I don’t know my own strength.” She ridiculed. With that, she gave a mighty shove while still holding onto the blade of the Master Sword as he flew and landed on Zelda.

Midna took one final look at the blade and then tossed it like a piece of trash. She gave another lightning fast burst of speed as the muscles in her leg contracted and relaxed again. She stopped right in front of them as she scanned them in their condition.

“Well, well, well. The tables have turned, haven’t they?” both Zelda and Link remained silent. “I could easily kill you both right now.” She paused again as she stared at them. “But I still need the princess to formally surrender her people to me.” She then turned her attention to Link. “As for you, you’re worthless. You’ve served your purpose. You would be much more useful to me dead. So I can show Hyrule just how strong their mighty hero chosen by the gods really is compared to me!” She laughed almost as if like Ganondorf’s.

When she laughed Zelda quickly regained consciousness as she realized what had happened. When Ganondorf’s remains were burned, his corrupted piece of the Triforce travelled to the one it deemed most worthy and corrupted them, just as it has Ganondorf! But Zelda knew just as well as anyone, she was no match for the titanic Midna in her current state. So Zelda had a plan, but she only got one shot. 1341311.content:
While camping outside for the night, Dawn, Ash and Brock were sitting around their campground. Their water was running low and the nearest Pokemon center was two miles away. Dawn volunteered to find a river to refill their water supply. Taking Piplup with her, Dawn set off. For nearly eleven minutes, she couldn't find a stream of water or lake or any water source, but she did find something else.

Glowing under a pile of leaves, Dawn and Piplup discovered a strange object. It smelled heavenly and Dawn couldn't help, but pick it up. A small powder went on her fingertips and she tasted it. To her amazement, it tasted like sugar and it had a strong hook on her taste buds. She didn't know it, but she discovered a rare candy, which boost a Pokemon's level. Not wasting anytime, she ate it. "Hmm, tasty." she said. Suddenly, she noticed her right arm was growing as well as her other arm. She watched her whole body growing stronger and taller. The feeling she was getting was simply amazing. Her clothes ripped to shreds as she grew to 14 feet tall and weighed around 350 pounds of muscle. Flexing her arms, now a foot around, she felt stronger as she smirked and posed in front of Piplup.

13413112.content:
As Dawn continued to pose and flex for Piplup (who seemed more bewildered by his owner's behaviour than anything else), a small object on the ground caught her eye. Kneeling down to get a closer look, she realised that it was another Rare Candy! Rather than eating it like the first, though, Dawn decided instead to put it aside and save it for now. 'As much as I've enjoyed growing,' she thought, 'I think it might be for the best if I took some time to get used to my new body before trying it again...' Carefully picking up the tiny candy with her large, powerful hands, the muscular giantess slipped it beneath her white hat, the only article of clothing to survive her growth.

With the second Rare Candy safely squared away, Dawn turned her attention back to her new muscles. As much as she'd enjoyed idly flexing them, she now hoped to put them to the test. "I wonder if I'm actually as strong as I look...?" she said aloud, turning toward a nearby tree. It was clearly an older tree, several times taller than her, and with a wide trunk. Wrapping her thick, muscular arms around the tree, Dawn began to pull upwards with all of her might, hoping to wrench the mighty oak from the ground. Every muscle in her arms and upper body bulged out as she pulled, and many engorged veins snaked across their surface. After about a minute's worth of effort, it seemed a losing battle for the tree, and with a powerful roar, Dawn tore it right out of the ground, before swinging it in a circle and hurling it over the horizon.

After staring in awe for several moments at her feet of strength, the blue-haired girl squealed and hopped up and down with glee. Piplup soon joined her, cheering for his Trainer. Dawn's spastic jumping caused the ground to shake for quite some distance, alerting anyone nearby to her presence. "Whoa. What kind of Pokemon is that?" Meowth exclaimed. "You don't know? You're a Pokemon." James said. "Hey; that's just plain racist, James." Meowth snapped back. "Whatever this Pokemon is, it's mine!" Jessie exclaimed, "Seviper, Yanmega, attack!"

With a flash, Seviper and Yanmega appeared. "No fair! Carnivine! Let's go!" James yelled. Suddenly, Carnivine appeared as well. Then turned around to bite James for the hundred million, four thousand, six hundred and seventy-fourth time.

"When you will learn that I'm not the target?!?" James screamed. Piplup was ready for battle, but Dawn placed her hand down and said, "No Piplup. I'll handle this." She did wanted to test her new strength and now was the best time.

"Seviper, poison tail!" Jessie yelled. "Carnivine, bullet seed!" James hollered. Responding to their trainers' commands, Seviper's tail glowed purple and was about hit Dawn...

when she caught it in dead air! Seviper gasped as Dawn gave it a grin. Then she grabbed its neck and using her new strength, she swung it around a few times and with a final twist, she tossed it against a tree. The tree was tore from its roots from the impact. Seviper was out.

"Seviper!" Jessie cried. Dawn smiled, but then she was hit by Carnivine's bullet seed and a cloud of smoke appeared. "Nice work, Carnivine!" James cheered. Carnivine chirped back in joy. But when the smoke cleared, they gasped.

Dawn didn't have a scratch on her. "Nice try. Now it's my turn!" she called back. Swinging her right arm up, she performed a perfect right hook and bashed Carnivine so hard, it went flying. "CCCARRNIVIINNNEEE!" the plant Pokemon screamed as it disappeared into the sky.

"CARNIVINE!!!" James cried. "Yanmega, sonic boom!" Jessie commanded. Firing several sonic booms, the dragonfly Pokemon managed to hit Dawn, but like before, she wasn't harmed. Grabbing Yanmega from the air, Dawn began to use it like a baseball bat. Swatting Team Rocket like baseballs, she hit them so hard, they smashed into the trees and were almost killed from the impact.

Groaning and moaning, the down four had cuts and broken bones. "Maybe this wasn't such a good idea." Jessie said. "WOBBUFFET!!" the blue Pokemon said.

"Wobbuffet, go get that Pokemon!" Jessie commanded. Wobbuffet jumped in front. When Dawn punched it, Wobbuffet used counter, knocking her back. But then Dawn responded with a powerful kick. Sending the blue Pokemon back into the pile, Wobbuffet groaned in pain.

Groaning her beaten enemies, Dawn said to them, "Here's the deal. You losers never bother me or my friends again. Or I'll use you as stress balls when I'm really in a bad mood." Nodding in agreement, Dawn said, "Good. Now good-bye." Using only an ounce of her strength, she tossed them away.

"Looks like Team Rocket's..." their motto broke when they hit the ground. "Oh, Piplup. Did you see me?" she said, "I just beat Team Rocket all by myself!!" Piplup cheered. As they celebrated...

Jessie was bored. Completely, utterly bored. She left James and Meowth after too many failures of catching a single pokemon. Finally had it with their failures,

Sitting on top on a stone in a sandy ditch all alone, she sighed and said, "James and Meowth think they can catch that twerp's Pikachu without me? I'd love to prove them wrong."

Big words, but Jessie didn't have any plan on how to capture her prey. She pondered for some kind of idea and to help her brain work, she paced in circles until she tripped on something metal. Falling on the ground, she turned back to the metal piece and dug it up. "You little piece of metal." she grumbled, "You'll teach you to..." Her sentence was cut off by something she never thought existed: a black metal lamp like those in fiction.

"A magic lamp?" she smiled, "Let's get rubbing." She rubbed the lamp and then a cloud of purple mist smoked out of the lamp, revealing itself into a purple-colored female genie wearing typical genie clothes and had black hair, green eyes and a light-purple vapor under her waist. "Okay, how can I serve you?" the genie spoke in a bored manner.

"Oh, a real genie and I get three wishes of my choosing." she chuckled to herself, 'For my first wish, I wish I can grant wishes for myself." "Sorry, can't do that wish." she replied. "Okay, I wish I was the queen of the world." she spoke. "That one's impossible too." replied the genie.

Getting frustrated, Jessie spoke, "Is there any wish I can be granted?" "Besides wishing for more wishes, power to rule the world and you to make yourself God, anything goes. Might I suggest you wish for something you really desire? Maybe something simplier and more realistic?" the genie spoke.

Jessie about this for a while and she knew what she wanted. "Okay for my first wish, I wish for...

Using her magic, she brought Ash and Pikachu to theie location. Puzzled by their new surroundings, Ash said, "Hey, where are we, Pikachu?" "Pika!" screamed Pikachu. "What's wrong... Aahhh!" screamed Ash at the sight of the Amazon Jessie.

"Hello, boys." Jessie said in a giggling manner, "Are you glad to see little old me?" "Jessie, but how did you..." asked Ash. "Get so powerful?" she asked, "You're going to see in a minute."

"Genie, for my last and final wish..." Jessie spoke, "I wish...
1342311.title: One Way to Travel.

13423112.content:
"I wish that Ash and his Pikachu will be my servents and Pikachu's electric attacks can't harm me, they or anyone else can't unwish it and they have no memory of anything, except that they're my servents and their friendship with each other."

"That's a pretty big wish." said the genie, "Here it goes." So she cast the spell onto them. Within seconds, Ash and Pikachu had a complete memory wipe. All of their other friendships were gone as well as their other memories.

Once the magic was done, the genie returned to her bottle and Jessie and buried it in back in the sand. Turning her attention toward her old enemies, Ash groaned and asked, 'Hey, Pikachu, do you remember what happened?" "Pika.' Pikachu replied with no memory either.

"Oh boys, come here." Jessie called her new servents. "Oh, coming Miss Jessie." Ash spoke to his new mistress. "Oh the wish worked. Now I have them in my power." "What would you like us to do, Miss Jessie?" Jessie pondered about what she wanted them to do for her. "I would like you two to...
13423112.title: Jessie's Plans.

15433222.content:
Bethesda? They have a fair few.
Fallout
Skyrim
Etc
15433222.title: More

154332222.content: Alright, how about Blizzard? We all know Overwatch, World of Warcraft, StarCraft, etc
154332222.title: Nah, more

15433222211.content:
Wicked!

Sorry, anyway let's get to it already (oops did it again) and choose your favorite OW lady starting with the cover girl herself, Tracer.
15433222211.title: Overwatch

choices: The chronal accelerator lights up and Tracer awakens...but something feels off
The accelerator lights up and Tracer in D.Va's arms starts growing bigger
154332222111.content:
The payload just had a short distance to go and it was Tracer and her teams job to keep things going until it reached the destination. Thanks to Mercy's healing her previous wounds had completely disappeared and the Brit was ready to get back into the fight and with a quick thank you she did just that joining up with D.Va, while her MEKA's shield wasn't as powerful as Reinhardt's she was still able to prove some cover for herself and Tracer who sped in and out of enemy lines tagging as many opponents as she could with gunfire and her sticky bomb.

The two worked well together D.Va even protecting herself and Tracer from Junkrat's remote tire bomb! However in doing so the Korean girl's mech was in critical condition any more pressure and she'd have to abandon it until she could call forth a new MEKA.

"Then I say, toss it love! If you get what am saying."

The brunette shot her a wink that D.Va quickly picked up on. Right she'd send the enemy a bit of a surprise of her own!

Suddenly the caught sight of Roadhog turn the street corner, the large strong-fat man ready to blast the two girls down instead Tracer took the offensive and began to distract the big man while lined up just right, boosted forward, and ejected right out as the MEKA sailed toward Roadhog. Tracer spotted the approaching mech and darted away far too fast for Roadhog to catch her, however D.Va was different.

The Korean yelped as the man's chain latched onto her right leg her body suddenly being flung right at Roadhog with the MEKA seconds away from detonating, she was sure to be caught in the blast radius!

Tracer realizing what had happened sped back as quick as she could hoping she could reach D.Va in time. She did landing a quick pistol whip on the bigger man, it didn't do much damage but D.Va was shaken free.

"Hang on, love. This is gonna be close!"

Grabbing the other girl by the hand Tracer blinked away just as the MEKA self destructed. Wither or not that took out Roadhog didn't matter at the moment all that was getting herself and D.Va to safety unfortunately Tracer underestimated the speed of the blast...

The last thing D.Va remembered was being rescued by Tracer from Roadhog and her own MEKA's self destruction however the blast had caught up to the speedy brunette she remembered screaming and then everything went black for a while.

Her body ached which was a sign she was still alive, although in tremendous pain, to her side however laid Tracer and D.Va gasped realizing that she was still unconscious!

"Oh God, Tracer!"

She must have shielded her or simply taken most of the blast either way the brunette wasn't moving.

"Tracer, come on stay with me. You have to wake up!"

D.Va wanted to lift her up but she simply lacked the strength to do so instead all she could was cradle her fallen teammate until hopefully help arrived.
154332222111.title: Tracer

154332222112.content: Okay how about the pro gamer herself, D.Va? Maybe at some point she'll start using her MEKA as a weight.
154332222112.title: How about another girl

1543322221122.content: I think Mercy deserves a chance, maybe she could start using a different kind of "healing" spell to grow?
1543322221122.title: Keep on going

15433222211222.content: Well what about the big girl herself, the Russian powerhouse Zarya. Nothing says that the big can't get bigger.
15433222211222.title: Another girl

154332222112222.content: How about the cold sniper from France, Widowmaker? I don't think that tight outfit of hers would hold for long.
154332222112222.title: Yet another girl

15433222211222222.content: Down to the last two: Symmetra or Pharah?
15433222211222222.title: Someone Else

info.description: Basically the same deal as my other interactive story, but this time, the focus is on female muscle growth, as opposed to weight gain. You know what to do, folks.
